title: Border, 1850–1900
dimensions:
a) Overall: 48 x 7 cm (18 7/8 x 2 3/4 in.)
b) Overall: 19 x 7 cm (7 1/2 x 2 3/4 in.)
c) Overall: 38.8 x 7 cm (15 1/4 x 2 3/4 in.)
description:
Central band of tapestry or cross-stitch imitation. Alternating motifs of pink and orange flowers, separated by foliage. Narrow bands of small squares along top and bottom edges. Printed on black ground.

H# 26

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1850–1900.
1850–1900. Block-printed on machine-made paper.. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-133-a/c.
